channel.title: [Pi] Npc/Attacked Clipping [Pi]
channel.description: Hey guys, I'm trying to add NPC clipping, so they can't just roam through walls, and attacked clipping, so that players or npc's can run through objects to get the their opponent. I have tried multiple tutorials on Rune-Server but all of them either, just plain don't work due to crappy coding, or crash my client because of something to do with NPCHandler process. But, if anybody can help me figure out how to add NPC Clipping and NPC/Player Attacking clipping, that'd be super helpful!

item.title: [Pi] Npc/Attacked Clipping [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

[quote=“b00mz1029, post:9, topic:538409”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=657235.msg4396858#msg4396858 date=1389405106]

The tutorial may be of some help, check it out.

I finished it and nothing went wrong. It didn’t change the combat clipping problem. I’m sorry if I’m being no help but I honestly have no idea what to do from this point. I’m currently clueless. I’m trying to be as helpful and UN-needy as possible. I’m just not sure what to do. Any more ideas?

Find a combat clipping tutorial. I’m sure there are tutorials.
[/quote]

I’ve literally tried 99% if them and none of them have worked so far. It’s been awhile since I’ve tried one so let me go try one and I’ll post the problems. (Someone please post so I can come back with errors)[/quote]
Okay goodluck.

Read full topic
